setupScript.name: moveFocusAndCheckFirstCheckbox
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first checkbox and sets its state to checked

user: When the focus is on the first checkbox, read the first checkbox.  Note: it should be in the checked state.
instructions.raw: When the focus is on the first checkbox, read the first checkbox.  Note: it should be in the checked state.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: State of the checkbox (checked) is conveyed
